page.title: 11RED CROSS IN CORBRIDGE
page.content: The active members are a commandant, centre organiser,junior and youth leaders and about 3 others.The Red Cross members meet in their own hall which is sheduled to have essential repairs and refurbishment in 1986. Throughout the year there is a first aid and home nursing course open to all.Members do duties at the Rugby Club,local shows,garden fetes and race meetings.There is also a medical loan scheme where people can borrow equipment for nursing sick relatives in their own homes.Fund raising is constantly needed and the main event is a large autumn fayre which usually raises over 500 pounds.This, along with regular whist drives,are organised by a members group of 15 people.
